[i]({2U} can be paid with any two mana or with {U}. This card’s mana value is 3.)[/i]
Noxious 1 [i](Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player gets a poison counter.)[/i]
When Spinal Jester dies, proliferate. [i](Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)[/i]
